field_description.processed: One year after Biden’s election, cross strait and US-China relations seem more unstable than during the Trump administration. If the status quo is desirable, what can the U.S. and Taiwan do to maintain the status quo? This hybrid webinar brings together US and Taiwan scholars, in addition to Taiwanese policymakers, to explore the drivers of increasing tensions in the cross-strait area, and to examine the credibility of proposed solutions.
